items.subject: maths
items.title: Linear Equations
items.content: Example: 2x + 4 = 0. Move 4 to the other side: 2x = -4, so x = -2.

items.subject: maths
items.title: Geometry Basics
items.summary: Angles in a triangle sum to 180°.
items.content: If a triangle has angles 60° and 50°, the third angle is 180° - 110° = 70°.
